scripts.pm2: pm2 start src/app.ts --name core-delegate --interpreter ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node --node-args="-r tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json" --watch --env development && pm2 logs
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && tsc && tsc-alias && echo 'Copying HTML files...' && cpx "src/**/*.html" dist/ && cpx "src/presentation/assets/img/campus_accesses.png" dist/presentation/assets/img/ && echo 'HTML files and image copied!'
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r module-alias/register dist/app.js
